string.text: Help me!!! I need medikit.
New tasks received.
Task completed.
Task failed.
Task updated.
Object acquired.
Object lost.
Money gained.
Money lost.
To talk to someone point sight at him and press ‘E’ button.
To activate PDA, press 'P' button.
To activate map press 'M'.
Find artifact in the place pointed on the map and bring it to the trader.
Search dead bodies, you may find some useful staff.
Hand a medikit to this dunce.

Press Contact (Ñ). In and on minimap on the screen other stalkers with activated PDA will appear. Their attitude to you will also be stated on the screen. Be careful if you see enemies on the screen. However bandits and, heh, monsters usually don’t use PDA, so you better watch out in the Zone.
Watch out! You’re nearby anomalies. Use bolts to define their borders.
Marked, watch out. Next time it may be you!
Hey, there is some kind of action near you. I send coordinates to you. Check, what are going there.
Well, Marked, it’s up to you. This way or another, you’ve passed the examination, but deal with Wolf and his team on your own. Generally I’m waiting for you, got some job.
empty text
Well done, Marked. If it continues, you’ll acquire many friends. Come into mine, we’ll have a chat.

Branded One. The military uncovered something in SRI “Agroprom”. And this is something I’m very after, so as you I guess. You need to gain the info and deliver it to bartender in stalker bar. Get on it.
Stalker, you’ve have intruded territory under Duty control… Any assault attempt on our people will be punished by the mere death.

Attention everyone!!! Duty outpost online. The pack of mutants is moving towards the Bar from the Black Valley. Everyone who will help us to shoot out that scums will be granted gratitude from our side. You have Duty word.

Branded one, stalkers whisper of Hawk stalker to have shown up in the village vicinity. He wasn’t seen around for over six months now. He attempted finding a passage to the zone center and disappeared without trace, and now popped up back again. He was seen recently in Dark Valley, somewhere behind the Monolith base. When time allows, find out what’s about him.
Branded one, be careful – a new anomaly is said to have shown up in the village – it’s moving swift-fast, and moreover, the damn thing can’t be seen.
Mind the mines – sapper can be mistaken twice…
If you sit for the whole night in the village on Tower – something will definitely happen… :)
Attention, all the volunteers to thin out your brains – the passage to Radar is guarded by Monolith squad. I gather you are aware they shoot up everyone. Good luck.
Hey, Marked, one stalker just returned from deep raid into Zone. He is wounded and can't move anymore. Help him, may be he know something about Gunslinger.
Hey, Marked. There is a badly wounded stalker not far from you, he was coming back after a trip deep inside the Zone. Help him, he may know something about the Gunslinger.
